thread.title: Man does splits all over NYC: Video |
thread.title_full: Man does splits all over NYC: Video | The Advertiser

author: HALEY GOLDBERG
title: Man does splits all over NYC: Video |
text:
THE streets of New York City have always offered small treasures of humanity, from cats balancing on people’s heads to clowns pushing small animals in strollers.
But 20-year-old Vine star Logan Paul found a new way to shock the city’s passers-by: an unexpected pop into the splits.
The flexible Los Angeles actor took to the subway and busy footpaths to fall — without warning — into the splits, to the surprise of those around him.
Here's the longer version for my Twitter squad: pic.twitter.com/dMcx6i4oQu
— Logan Paul (@LoganPaul) August 30, 2015 “I thought it would be funny to just drop in the splits in the middle of the subway,” Paul said.
“I did it and I sent it to my roommate, and then he said you should do a bunch of these and just post it.”
His Facebook video captures the week-long splitting adventure, and it’s gained more than 42 million views to date.
It’s hard to determine what’s more mesmerising: the hunky blond popping into the delicate pose, or the shocked faces around him.
“When I get up, somebody’s always like, ‘That was amazing,’ ” he says. “Anytime where someone dies laughing is the best reaction.”
Photo: @loganpaul. Source: Instagram
And in true New York form, nobody lent a hand.
“I would always yell, ‘My hammy’ [when I was getting up], and no one ever helped me.”
The actor says he learned how to do the splits in at school in Year 10, and he’s documented himself “splitting” repeatedly online, ripping his boxers the first time he gave it a go at home.
Thank the flexible gods, this isn’t his last foray.
“The next time you see a Logan Paul split video on the internet, it’s going to be bigger, bolder and better, so yes I do have plans.”
Just don’t expect any help from New Yorkers if you get stuck, Logan.
This article originally appeared on The New York Post .
 42 million views for doing the splits
